summary: Disintegrate DeFi Protocol - A decentralized finance protocol that allows users to burn ICP tokens to receive tokens, with burn history tracking and token claiming features
architectural_notes: DeFi protocol with ICP token burning mechanism
Wallet integration supporting ICP and Disintegrate tokens

existing_features.title: Add a wallet interface component that displays both ICP and Disintegrate token balances side-by-side in the UI
Create a React Query hook to fetch ICP balance from the backend actor
Update the wallet interface to restrict token interactions to only ICP and Disintegrate tokens, preventing any other token types from being displayed or transferred

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate wallet that supports ICP and Disintegrate token only
Implement backend query function to retrieve the authenticated user's ICP balance
